content.rendered:
Volunteer Opportunities

Second Sunday depends on awesome volunteers to make the event run smoothly. Help out at a great neighborhood festival and earn a million good karma points! Sign up for one shift, or a reoccurring spot on our team!

Day-Of Volunteers

  • Festival Set-Up + Vendor Logistic (9:00AM – 12:30 PM): Includes assisting vendors load-in, setting up barricades + posting signage, directing vendor traffic, and ensuring a smooth start to the day

  • Festival Support (12:00 PM – 3:00 PM): Supporting event logistics as needed

  • Festival Tear-DownÂ (4:30 PM – 6:30 PM) assist with various program activities as needed, aid vendor load out, breakÂ down signage, tear-down tents, tables, and barricades

Perks: Each volunteer receives a free beer per shift and our gratitude forever!

Want To Be A Volunteer?

Register Here
